title: Angler Exploit Kit – PCAP Network Forensics Case Study
description: PCAP forensics on a multi-stage Angler EK attack chain using malicious Java payloads.

title: Vulnversity – TryHackMe CTF Walkthrough
description: This write-up covers my walkthrough of the Vulnversity CTF room on TryHackMe, aimed at building foundational skills in web exploitation.

title: Wonderland – TryHackMe CTF Walkthrough
